Fans have been wanting it, podcasts have discussed it, but is Fortnite finally coming to Nintendo Switch? Well, the popular title was recently rated by the South Koran age ratings board.

Click here for the link.

I guess we’ll just have to wait until E3 to learn more.

 

But what do you think about this? Are you excited to play Fortnite on your Switch? Let us know in the comment section below.
